abstract.p: L L Bean, apparel retailer, names Martin/Williams to handle its advertising account, with billings estimated at $15 million to $20 million; previous agency was Mullen (S)

block.p: L. L. Bean, the apparel retailer in Freeport, Me., has named Martin/ Williams in Minneapolis, part of the Omnicom Group, to handle its account, with billings estimated at $15 million to $20 million. The decision came after a three-month review that had been narrowed to Martin/ Williams; Carmichael Lynch in Minneapolis, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; and FCB Worldwide in New York, part of True North Communications.

L. L. Bean, the apparel retailer in Freeport, Me., has named Martin/ Williams in Minneapolis, part of the Omnicom Group, to handle its account, with billings estimated at $15 million to $20 million. The decision came after a three-month review that had been narrowed to Martin/ Williams; Carmichael Lynch in Minneapolis, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; and FCB Worldwide in New York, part of True North Communications.
The previous agency, Mullen in Wenham, Mass., part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic, parted ways with Bean in July.
